data.prayer: Father, answer the requests of your people in the state of Querétaro.
data.verse: This is the boldness which we have toward him, that, if we ask anything according to his will, he listens to us.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Querétaro, Mexico
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the church of Querétaro, Mexico that they are blessed with every heavenly blessing.
data.verse: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, who has blessed us with every spiritual blessing in the heavenly places in Christ

data.prayer: Lord, please provide elders whose hearts are completely yours in every town in the state of Querétaro.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.prayer: Father, grace the churches in Querétaro, Mexico with faithful local leaders.
data.verse: Where there is no guidance, a people falls, but in an abundance of counselors there is safety.

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Huichol people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Huichol people.
Lord, please make the same Spirit that raised Jesus from the dead give life to those who are called by his name in the state of Querétaro.
data.verse: But if the Spirit of him who raised up Jesus from the dead dwells in you, he who raised up Christ Jesus from the dead will also give life to your mortal bodies through his Spirit who dwells in you.

data.prayer: Spirit, please defend the 164,374 believers in Querétaro against self-centered spirituality. Open their eyes to the fields ripe for harvest around them.
Spirit, help every believer in Querétaro, Mexico be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks them for the reason for their hope.
data.verse: But in your hearts revere Christ as Lord. Always be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks you to give the reason for the hope that you have. But do this with gentleness and respect.
